title: Shares in Trump social media company sink following concerns about insider selloff
summary: Shares in Trump Media and Technology Group dropped about 5% after the company filed paperwork with the SEC that could allow Trump's trust to sell up to 115 million shares, worth more than $2.3 billion, raising concerns about a potential insider selloff
